result.title: Programming Tutorial Blog â€” Code Gyan
result.content:
Hi,

I've started a blog where I write posts regularly on topics which are difficult to understand (for average coders) and have limited resources online. You may follow the blog here . All topics are discussed with problems from spoj, codechef and codeforces. Currently, it has posts on topics like 'Inclusion-Exclusion principle' , 'Square-Root decomposition', 'Sieves' , 'DP' etc. Please feel free to share / comment / contribute. Any suggestion / constructive criticism is appreciated.

Edit : Added post on segment trees.

Edit : Added post on dynamic programming.

Edit : Added post on network flow.
